about.name: JIN KAI
about.desc:
Software Engineer with experience in web and mobile development, specialising in React and UiKit.

A self-learner passionate about full stack development for complex, high traffic apps.

presentRole.title: Software Developer
presentRole.desc:
• Developed Payments Features for OCBC consumer banking mobile app using UiKit and Combine
  • Worked on feature enhancements for OCBC overseas corporate banking MFE app
  • Led the legacy codebase migration for two features to React framework

pastRole1.title: Technical Consultant
pastRole1.desc: • Developed a full stack banking app with JWT and 2FA email authentication and authorization, along with chart visualization for spending analysis.

pastRole2.title: Product Manager
pastRole2.desc:
• Created dashboards using an in-house visualization platform for product analytics
  • Automated operational communications and data reporting procedures
  • Kickstart new product engagement channels and conducted company-wide training to raise awareness
